mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Userss (UsersId, password, email, phoneNumber, nickName, UsersProfileName, UsersProfileUrl) VALUES (#{UsersId}, SHA2(#{password}, 256), #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickName}, #{UsersProfileName}, #{UsersProfileUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Userss WHERE UsersID = #{UsersId} AND PASSWORD = SHA2(#{password}, 256)
